channel.title: Download Battlefield 3 for Free from Origin
channel.description:
Thought this should have its own thread.
Get Battlefield 3 for FREE from Origin, until June 3/14
[url='https://www.guru3d.com/news_story/grab_battlefield_3_free_on_origin_for_a_limited_time.html']https://www.guru3d.com/news_story/grab_battlefield_3_free_on_origin_for_a_limited_time.html[/url]
Plants vs Zombies GOTY Edition is also available for free.
